price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߝߕߌ߫ ߖߌߘߊ߲ߣߍ߲߫ ߢߐ߲߰ ߢߌ߬ߡߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߏ߬ ߘߴߏ߬ ߦߋ߫
arabic: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: faman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin khayran yarahu
